result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jonah Lee Miller

records.addlTxt: *Appear for booking within 30 days to the Marquette County Jail   *No operation of a motor vehicle without a valid drivers license   **Bond to be signed and returned to the COC office within 14 days

11:18 AM Defendant Jonah Lee Miller appeared by phone.  Prosecuting attorney Brian J. Juech appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
2022TR000916, 2022TR000917 tracking with 22CF130:
Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives the reading.  Court advises defendant of maximum penalties.  Defendant understands. Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Defendant understands and waives their right to an attorney.  Court finds waiver of attorney made freely, voluntarily & Intelligently. 
Court confirms address.

Atty Juech has no objection to a signature bond with conditions. 

BY THE COURT:  Court sets a $1,000 Signature bond with conditions:
*Appear for booking within 30 days to the Marquette County Jail 
*No operation of a motor vehicle without a valid drivers license 
**Bond to be signed and returned to the COC office within 14 days 

Court questions the defendant.  Defendant waives time limits for the Prelim.
BY THE COURT:  Defendant waives time limits for the preliminary hearing. 
The State will mail an offer to the defendant.
Status hearing scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status hearing on November 21, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
